item.title: Statistics
item.description: STATS is so fun! I never thought I would learn so much.We started using python. my_seq1 = “ATCATCATG” my_seq2 = “CAGCCCAATCAGGCTCTACTGCCACTAAACTTACGCAGGATATATTTACGCCGACGTACT” my_dict = {1: ‘ATC’, 2: ‘TCA’, 3:‘CAT’, 4:‘ATG’} print(my_dict) def count_kmers(seq,k): count = {} num= len(seq)-k+1 for i in range(num): kmer=seq[i:i+k] if kmer not in count: count[kmer] +=1 return count count_kmers(“CAGCCCAATCAGGCTCTACTGCCACTAAACTTACGCAGGATATATTTACGCCGACGTACT”) count_kmers(“ATCATCATG”) This code helps is find sequences.
